article_title: Children With Life-Threatening Illnesses Need More Than Obamacare

article_metadata.description: VideoArmed with a guitar since she was 10 years old, Leora Friedman uses music to brighten the lives of children who are diagnosed with life-threatening illnesses. Her father is a pediatric oncologist, and at a young age she saw the hardships that are thrust on seriously-ill children and their families. [...]
article_metadata.author: Denise Restauri
